forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the skies drift into a state of tranquil clarity. The air carries a gentle chill, reminiscent of the embrace of twilight lingering just a moment too long. While the forecast offers the comfort of mostly sunny skies later on, threading the day with ambers and golds, the early hours are dressed in a veil of calmness, where a light breeze dances along at a moderate pace. 

By midday, serenity will mingle with warmth as temperatures edge towards the mid-sixties, a perfect canvas for outdoor endeavors. There are no fog banks lying in wait to obscure the iconic skyline; instead, the city stands proud under the vastness of blue, inviting you to enjoy its charms. Dress in layers that allow you to adapt; a light jacket will serve you well in the cooler morning and as the day evolves, you will bask in the gentle warmth and open your collar to the soft sun. Take a moment to wander along the waterfront or find a quiet café, where the hum of life unfolds at its own delightful cadence—perfectly mundane, yet profoundly enjoyable.
